New Records: This match broke the altitude record for an international fixture
Key Match Events: Ramiro Vaca scored the opening goal in the 13th minute
Carmelo Algara√±az scored a penalty before half-time
Miguel Terceros scored early in the second half
Enzo Monteiro scored in the 89th minute to seal the win
Pre-Game Insights: This was the first match at the Municipal de El Alto stadium, which is at a higher altitude than the usual Hernando Siles stadium
Post-Match Reflections: Oscar Villegas, the newly-appointed coach of Bolivia, earned his first triumph at the helm
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match was played at an altitude of 4,150 metres above sea level
Others: Bolivia moved provisionally into the international playoffs spot in seventh place with six points, just one behind Brazil
Bolivia will next play at Chile on Tuesday, while fourth-placed Venezuela host Uruguay
